Text: Do you guys have access to the windows version too? Will seed to infinite - and beyond!

Apparently, this is all you need for the Windows version as well. First extract the Wenlin4 folder, then just install the update tool (available on their website) to the same directory.

extract the Wenlin4 folder, then just install the update tool:

http://www.wenlin.com/local_acc7y/wenlin402update.exe

to the Wenlin4 folder

works in windows 8
